sentence.text: The woman said that he is funny.

annotation.infon: (S1 (S (S (NP (DT The) (NN woman)) (VP (VBD said) (SBAR (IN that) (S (NP (NN he)) (VP (VBZ is) (ADJP (JJ funny))))))) (. .)))
annotation.text: The woman said that he is funny.

sentence.text: John seems to want to see him.

annotation.text: John seems to want to see him.

sentence.text: This is the man he said John wrote about.

sentence.text: John's portrait of him is interesting.

annotation.text: Mary knows the people who John introduced to each other.
